00041 namespace TREX {
00042   namespace europa {
00043     
00055     class EuropaDomain :public TREX::transaction::DomainBase {
00056     public:
00057       static TREX::utils::Symbol const type_name;
00058       
00059       explicit EuropaDomain(EUROPA::Domain const &dom);
00060       EuropaDomain(EuropaDomain const &other);
00061       ~EuropaDomain();
00062       
00063       TREX::transaction::DomainBase *copy() const;
00064       std::ostream &toXml(std::ostream &out, size_t tabs) const;
00065       
00066       bool isInterval() const {
00067         return m_dom->isInterval();
00068       }
00069       bool isEnumerated() const {
00070         return m_dom->isEnumerated();
00071       }
00072       bool isFull() const;  
00073       bool isSingleton() const {
00074         return m_dom->isSingleton();
00075       }
00076       bool intersect(TREX::transaction::DomainBase const &other) const;
00077       bool equals(TREX::transaction::DomainBase const &other) const;
00078       
00079       TREX::transaction::DomainBase &restrictWith(TREX::transaction::DomainBase const &other);
00080       
00081       EUROPA::Domain const &europaDomain() const {
00082         return *m_dom;
00083       }
00084       
00085     private:
00086       EUROPA::Domain *m_dom;
00087       
00088       static EUROPA::Domain *safe_copy(EUROPA::Domain *dom);
00089       
00090       std::ostream &print_domain(std::ostream &out) const;
00091       boost::any singleton() const;
00092       std::string stringSingleton() const; 
00093       
00094     }; // TREX::europa::EuropaDomain
00095     
00103     class EuropaEntity :public TREX::transaction::EnumeratedDomain<TREX::utils::Symbol> {
00104       typedef TREX::transaction::EnumeratedDomain<TREX::utils::Symbol> base_class;
00105     public:
00111       static TREX::utils::Symbol const type_name;
00112       
00113       EuropaEntity()
00114         :base_class(type_name) {}
00128       template<class Iter>
00129       EuropaEntity(Iter from , Iter to) 
00130         :base_class(type_name, from, to) {}
00137       explicit EuropaEntity(TREX::utils::Symbol const &val) 
00138         :base_class(type_name, val) {}
00159      explicit EuropaEntity(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node)
00160         :base_class(node) {}
00161       ~EuropaEntity() {}
00162       
00163       TREX::transaction::DomainBase *copy() const {
00164         return new EuropaEntity(*this);
00165       }
00166     }; // TREX::europa::EuropaEntity
